backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, public/private messaging, and access control with blob storage and authorization mixins. Includes message management with timestamp-based sorting and role-based permissions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old UserProfile schema (with 'name' field) to new schema (with 'displayName' field) while preserving profile pictures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features: removing profile picture upload from LoginPage.tsx and updating profile mutation hook to send null/empty profilePicture values.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, contexts, and configuration files for the messaging application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color tokens for the application theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'Alatele' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing Internet Identity authentication, profile setup flow, view navigation (group chat, private messages, conversations), and QueryClient/LanguageProvider setup.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Empty file placeholder for admin panel component.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Empty file placeholder for audio recorder component.
frontend/src/components/ChatNavigation.t: Navigation header component with app logo, user avatar, language toggle, logout button, and tabs for switching between group chat and private messages views.
frontend/src/components/ContactManager.t: Empty file placeholder for contact manager component.
frontend/src/components/ConversationList: Displays a list of private message conversations with avatars, last message previews, timestamps, and unread counts. Includes a UserSearch component and handles conversation selection.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header component showing the Alatele logo, user profile avatar, language toggle, and logout button. Displays the logged-in user's name.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Dropdown menu component for switching between English and Persian (Farsi) languages using a globe icon button.
frontend/src/components/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and displays a profile setup form for new users to enter their display name. Shows language toggle and manages authentication state.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Textarea input component for composing messages with a send button. Supports Enter key to send and Shift+Enter for new lines.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Renders a list of messages with sender avatars, names, timestamps, and message content. Fetches sender profiles and distinguishes between own and other users' messages.
frontend/src/components/MessagingInterfa: Main messaging interface combining MessageList and MessageInput components. Handles message loading, sending, and auto-scrolling to new messages.
frontend/src/components/PrivateConversat: Full-screen private conversation view with header showing contact info, back button, and logout. Integrates MessageList and MessageInput for one-on-one messaging.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePictureUp: React component for uploading and managing profile pictures with preview, validation (type/size), upload progress tracking, and remove functionality using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/UserSearch.tsx: React component that provides a searchable list of all users with avatars, filtering by name, and user selection callback functionality.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context providing internationalization support for English and Farsi languages with nested translation objects for app UI strings. (Content truncated)
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options. (Content truncated)
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: React hook for fetching public messages with polling and sending messages with optimistic updates using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrivateMessages.ts: React hooks for managing private messages between users and fetching conversations list with last message and contact profile information. (Content truncated)
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profile management and fetching all users from messages, including queries for caller profile, user profiles by principal, and mutations for saving profiles.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en-US.json: English translations for the Alatele chat app covering login, profile setup, chat interface, search, and language selection.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/fa-IR.json: Farsi (Persian) translations for the Alatele chat app with RTL support, mirroring the English locale structure.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space and RTL support utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind CSS classes using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, requirements, and architectural notes for Alatele chat app with display-name-only login, public/private messaging, and 50MB file upload support.
